name: Therma klosie
description:
JSX is an XML/HTML   -like syntax used by React that extends ECMAScript so that XML/HTML-like text can co-exist with JavaScript/React code. ... Unlike the past, instead of putting JavaScript into HTML,
JSX allows us to put HTML into JavaScript.
JSX provides a concise and familiar syntax for defining a
tree structure with attributes that does not require learning a
templating language or leaving JavaScript. Both of which are can be a win when building large applications.
———————
